title: Eisenhower National Historic Site: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       Daily Fees   $7.50, Adults (13 years and older) $5.00, Youth (6 - 12 years of age) $5.00, Group (6-12, 16+ people) $6.50, Group (13 years and older, 16+ people) Painting of the Eisenhower home interior is now completed and all rooms are open for viewing. The fees cover shuttle bus; access to the Eisenhower home, grounds, and reception center; and all programs on the site.  Click here to purchase advance tickets.  Since lowering fees in 2005, the site no longer charges the standard Federal entrance fee and does not accept America the Beautiful, National Parks, Golden Age, Eagle, or Access Passes. For group reservations call toll free at 1 (877) 874-2478 daily 8 am - 5 pm, or e-mail us.
